question: How do leadership excerpts correlate with the adoption of emerging technologies in companies that have grown their social media presence?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have grown their social media presence. [SocialMediaInfo]
Gather leadership excerpts from these companies. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Identify the emerging technologies adopted by these companies. [CompanyTechStack]
Analyze the correlation between leadership excerpts and technology adoption. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt, CompanyTechStack]
